alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Frontier County through 345 PM CDT... At 259 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, or 18 miles southeast of Curtis, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eustis, Stockville, Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, Orafino, Freedom and Dancing Leaf Earth Lodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
